actions.text: Amendment SA 2504 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2504 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12595) To authorize, with an offset, an additional $4,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Air Force for Aging Military Aircraft Fleet Support.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2504 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2504 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Roberts.

purpose: To authorize, with an offset, an additional $4,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Air Force for Aging Military Aircraft Fleet Support.
